titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning "The Yale"
Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning "The Yale"
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday September 29, 2018 at 10:44

did.unittitle: Secretary's office, Yale University, records concerning The Yale

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, advertising records, computer files, an editor's log, working copies, and budget information documenting the publishing of The Yale: A Guide to Yale and New Haven .

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-A (YRG 4-A), Records of the Yale secretary's office.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Office of the Secretary, 2004.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning The Yale (RU 951). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, advertising records, computer files, an editor's log, working copies, and budget information documenting the publishing of The Yale: A Guide to Yale and New Haven .

controlaccess.subject: College publications
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

did.physdesc: (45 JPG, 101 TIF, 32 HTML, 1 PDF, 1 MPEG, 6 DOC, 3 TXT, 2 WPD, 31 Encapsulated PostScript, 4 Quark Xpress Data File, 1 OLE Compound Document, 1 AutoCAD Script, 1 MAC OSX Stationary, 1 Interleaf Document).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Original born digital files, as well as preservation masters, may not be accessed due to their fragility. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist request that they be made. Born digital files cannot be accessed remotely. System requirements include a Manuscripts and Archives computer and file viewing software.
